alert.note: Alert for Dunklin (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 6:18PM CDT until September 24 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Clay County in eastern Arkansas... Northeastern Dunklin County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 618 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Qulin, or 9 miles northwest of Chalk Bluff Natural Area, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Malden, Campbell, Chalk Bluff Natural Area, Clarkton, Holcomb, St. Francis, Saint Francis, Glennonville, Valley Ridge, Providence, Morris State Park, Wilhelmina, Brian, Chalk Bluff Battlefield Park, Baird, McGuires and Townley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
